title: Gross
description:
Selena Coppock, James Judd, Jamie Pinto and Travis Cook tell stories of icky life and yucky times.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Comfortfit and Portformat, Travis Cook, Jamie Pinto, Guster, James Judd, Phantom Planet, Selena Coppock)
